objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#1A237E'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#303F9F'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='circleGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#E0E0E0'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#BDBDBD'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFC107'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFD54F'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='url(#circleGradient)' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='280' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='850' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#accentGradient)' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='3'/><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='20' fill='#FFC107'/><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='15' fill='#FFC107'/><circle cx='200' cy='900' r='25' fill='#FFC107'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='18' fill='#FFC107'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='150' cy='400' r='80' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='950' cy='700' r='60' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/></g><path d='M150 200 L250 300' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M850 800 L950 900' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M150 800 L250 700' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M850 200 L950 300' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text: • PREMIUM FLYKNIT • GOLD SWOOSH • GUM OUTSOLE

product_details.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Flyknit - Wolf Grey/Golden Swoosh Edition
product_details.description:
• Premium Flyknit upper construction for lightweight breathability
• Iconic high-top silhouette with modern technology
• Striking grey colorway with metallic gold Nike swoosh
• Classic gum rubber outsole for superior traction
• Engineered mesh pattern for enhanced durability
• Air-cushioned midsole for all-day comfort
• Signature Jordan brand wing logo detailing
• Versatile design perfect for both street style and casual wear
• Responsive cushioning system for optimal support
• Traditional lacing system for secure fit

banner_details:
This banner design exudes a modern and sporty aesthetic, ideal for promoting footwear. At the top, the heading (`heading`) in bold white font establishes the product name, followed by a bright subheading (`subheading`) in yellow that adds energy. A high-quality product image (`product_image`) of sneakers is centrally positioned within a circular white frame bordered in yellow, drawing immediate attention. A yellow circular badge displays the price (`price`) with prominent numerals. Below the image, a horizontal features line (`description`) concisely highlights product attributes. At the bottom, a bold call-to-action button (`cta_button` & `cta`) encourages interaction. The background features dynamic blue gradients and soft geometric accents.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Indigo: #1A237E
- Royal Blue: #303F9F
- Warm Yellow: #FFC107
- Light Yellow: #FFD54F
- White: #FFFFFF
- Cool Grey: #BDBDBD
- Light Grey: #E0E0E0
product_color: The product image features a high-top sneaker with a minimal and modern aesthetic, primarily using soft gray and muted golden yellow tones. The dominant color is a light gray (#C5C8CA), forming the base fabric and laces of the sneaker. Accents in a warm mustard yellow (#D89A28) highlight the Nike swoosh, logo patch, and portions of the sole, providing a striking contrast without overwhelming the design. The white midsole (#F5F5F5) seamlessly bridges both primary colors, allowing for a clean transition. These tones blend harmoniously, creating a bold yet balanced palette ideal for an advertisement banner with fresh, sporty, and urban appeal.
